title: Tango Evelynn  dress stuck in leg
body: The Tango Evelynn skin's dress gets stuck while walking in stealth, I've tried it out on many occasions I'm pretty sure it's not my computer because I have tried patching League several times.

replies.body: They know about this bug for a very long time and have not still done anything in terms of fixing it.....because it is Evelynn, no love for her. {{champion:28}} {{item:3151}}

Hey RyanKyun -

Thanks for the report! This is a trivial issue, and not something we'll be addressing at this time.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=co2weE57,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2016-02-19T23:59:58.399+0000)
>
> Hey RyanKyun -
> 
> Thanks for the report! This is a trivial issue, and not something we'll be addressing at this time.


I understand something like this might be trivial... But what do you mean by riot won't be addressing it at this time? Does this mean they have something visual in the works for her right now, and don't want to fix something that won't  be a thing soon anyway? Is riot too busy with other bugs, such as the zz'rot one right now?  Or is this bug just something you are going to leave?

> I understand something like this might be trivial... But what do you mean by riot won't be addressing it at this time? 

It's not something we have on our bug list to resolve right now. 

> Does this mean they have something visual in the works for her right now, and don't want to fix something that won't be a thing soon anyway? 

Unfortunately, I can't say one way or the other on this one. I'm on the Skins team myself, so I don't have a lot of insight into what's coming down the road besides what's listed on the Champion Update page. 

> Is riot too busy with other bugs, such as the zz'rot one right now?

Each team has their own bugs, so skins wouldn't be fixing Zz'Rot, but we do have other emergent bugs, such as bugs for upcoming content, as well as other issues like Snow Day Malzahar's recall poro being all blue. 

> Or is this bug just something you are going to leave?

For now, we are going to be leaving it.
how was the comment vague? They won't be fixing it. period.

Its more in surprise that riot would ever  admit such a thing, its kinda  unprofessional.  This is a skin, that people buy, and content in their game. They admit something is wrong with it. But they say they won't be fixing it?
Their stance on Eve is that they won't be doing anything to help the visual fidelity of her current state as they'll likely give her a VGU sometime in the next 5 years. :V

just another time riot is going to just ignore their invisible monster they've created. wtf is she even?! and they won't answer anything if asked about her as a whole thematic concept.... guess we will just have to keep asking for more sona and annie skins.....

When all they have to do is be like. 1. Open file, 2. go to pixles, 3. change to make stick out from her leg, 3. put in next patch, 4. DONE!!!!!.... or something to that affect. Its not like it reworking an entire champ. So unless they are doing a vu or something soon they need to fix these things.
